task.title: Add Browser
task.shortdesc: A web browser can be directly added to a OBS.

taskbody.context: Follow these simple steps to add browsers to be displayed while recording a screen in Windows operating system.
taskbody.result:
The Browser gets added to the Source of a Scene.Keep other browser settings as default. For details on browser settings for macOS and Linux operating systems, refer to link -
https://obsproject.com/kb/browser-source.
